<S>1161</S> The same<S>1722</S> <S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S> went<S>1831</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> out of<S>575</S> the house<S>3614</S>, and sat<S>2521</S> by<S>3844</S> the sea side<S>2281</S>.
And<S>2532</S> great<S>4183</S> multitudes<S>3793</S> were gathered together<S>4863</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, so that<S>5620</S> he<S>846</S> went<S>1684</S> into<S>1519</S> a ship<S>4143</S>, and sat<S>2521</S>; and<S>2532</S> the whole<S>3956</S> multitude<S>3793</S> stood<S>2476</S> on<S>1909</S> the shore<S>123</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he spake<S>2980</S> many things<S>4183</S> unto them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, a sower<S>4687</S> went forth<S>1831</S> to sow<S>4687</S>;
And<S>2532</S> when<S>1722</S> he<S>846</S> sowed<S>4687</S>, some<S>3739</S> <S>3303</S> seeds fell<S>4098</S> by<S>3844</S> the way side<S>3598</S>, and<S>2532</S> the fowls<S>4071</S> came<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> devoured<S>2719</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>2719</S>:
Some<S>1161</S> <S>243</S> fell<S>4098</S> upon<S>1909</S> stony places<S>4075</S>, where<S>3699</S> they had<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> much<S>4183</S> earth<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> forthwith<S>2112</S> they sprung up<S>1816</S>, because<S>1223</S> they had<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> deepness<S>899</S> of earth<S>1093</S>:
And<S>1161</S> when the sun<S>2246</S> was up<S>393</S>, they were scorched<S>2739</S>; and<S>2532</S> because<S>1223</S> they had<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> root<S>4491</S>, they withered away<S>3583</S>.
And<S>1161</S> some<S>243</S> fell<S>4098</S> among<S>1909</S> thorns<S>173</S>; and<S>2532</S> the thorns<S>173</S> sprung up<S>305</S>, and<S>2532</S> choked<S>638</S> them<S>846</S>:
But<S>1161</S> other<S>243</S> fell<S>4098</S> into<S>1909</S> good<S>2570</S> ground<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> brought forth<S>1325</S> fruit<S>2590</S>, some<S>3739</S> <S>3303</S> an hundredfold<S>1540</S>,<S>1161</S> some<S>3739</S> sixtyfold<S>1835</S>,<S>1161</S> some<S>3739</S> thirtyfold<S>5144</S>.
Who<S>3588</S> hath<S>2192</S> ears<S>3775</S> to hear<S>191</S>, let him hear<S>191</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Why<S>1302</S> speakest thou<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>?
He answered<S>611</S> and<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Because<S>3754</S> it is given<S>1325</S> unto you<S>5213</S> to know<S>1097</S> the mysteries<S>3466</S> of the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>, but<S>1161</S> to them<S>1565</S> it is<S>1325</S> not<S>3756</S> given<S>1325</S>.
For<S>1063</S> whosoever<S>3748</S> hath<S>2192</S>, to him<S>846</S> shall be given<S>1325</S>, and<S>2532</S> he shall have more abundance<S>4052</S>: but<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3748</S> hath<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S>, from<S>575</S> him<S>846</S> shall be taken away<S>142</S> even<S>2532</S> that<S>3739</S> he hath<S>2192</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> speak I<S>2980</S> to them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>: because<S>3754</S> they seeing<S>991</S> see<S>991</S> not<S>3756</S>; and<S>2532</S> hearing<S>191</S> they hear<S>191</S> not<S>3756</S>, neither<S>3761</S> do they understand<S>4920</S>.
And<S>2532</S> in<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S> is fulfilled<S>378</S> the prophecy<S>4394</S> of Esaias<S>2268</S>, which<S>3588</S> saith<S>3004</S>, By hearing<S>189</S> ye shall hear<S>191</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>4920</S> not<S>3364</S> understand<S>4920</S>; and<S>2532</S> seeing<S>991</S> ye shall see<S>991</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>1492</S> not<S>3364</S> perceive<S>1492</S>:
For<S>1063</S> this<S>5127</S> people's<S>2992</S> heart<S>2588</S> is waxed gross<S>3975</S>, and<S>2532</S> their ears<S>3775</S> are dull<S>917</S> of hearing<S>191</S>, and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S> they have closed<S>2576</S>; lest at any time<S>3379</S> they should see<S>1492</S> with their eyes<S>3788</S>, and<S>2532</S> hear<S>191</S> with their ears<S>3775</S>, and<S>2532</S> should understand<S>4920</S> with their heart<S>2588</S>, and<S>2532</S> should be converted<S>1994</S>, and<S>2532</S> I should heal<S>2390</S> them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> blessed<S>3107</S> are your<S>5216</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, for<S>3754</S> they see<S>991</S>: and<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> ears<S>3775</S>, for<S>3754</S> they hear<S>191</S>.
For<S>1063</S> verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> many<S>4183</S> prophets<S>4396</S> and<S>2532</S> righteous<S>1342</S> men have desired<S>1937</S> to see<S>1492</S> those things which<S>3739</S> ye see<S>991</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> seen<S>1492</S> them; and<S>2532</S> to hear<S>191</S> those things which<S>3739</S> ye hear<S>191</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>191</S> not<S>3756</S> heard<S>191</S> them.
Hear<S>191</S> ye<S>5210</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the parable<S>3850</S> of the sower<S>4687</S>.
When any<S>3956</S> one heareth<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the kingdom<S>932</S>, and<S>2532</S> understandeth<S>4920</S> it not<S>3361</S>, then cometh<S>2064</S> the wicked<S>4190</S> one, and<S>2532</S> catcheth away<S>726</S> that which<S>3588</S> was sown<S>4687</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S>. This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> he which received seed<S>4687</S> by<S>3844</S> the way side<S>3598</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he that received the seed<S>4687</S> into<S>1909</S> stony places<S>4075</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> he that heareth<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> anon<S>2117</S> with<S>3326</S> joy<S>5479</S> receiveth<S>2983</S> it<S>846</S>;
Yet<S>1161</S> hath he<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> root<S>4491</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>, but<S>235</S> dureth<S>2076</S> for a while<S>4340</S>: for<S>1161</S> when tribulation<S>2347</S> or<S>2228</S> persecution<S>1375</S> ariseth<S>1096</S> because<S>1223</S> of the word<S>3056</S>, by and by<S>2117</S> he is offended<S>4624</S>. <sup>offended: he relapseth, or, falleth into sin</sup>
He also<S>1161</S> that received seed<S>4687</S> among<S>1519</S> the thorns<S>173</S> is<S>2076</S> he that<S>3778</S> heareth<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S>; and<S>2532</S> the care<S>3308</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S>, and<S>2532</S> the deceitfulness<S>539</S> of riches<S>4149</S>, choke<S>4846</S> the word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> he becometh<S>1096</S> unfruitful<S>175</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he that received seed<S>4687</S> into<S>1909</S> the good<S>2570</S> ground<S>1093</S> is<S>2076</S> he<S>3778</S> that heareth<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> understandeth<S>4920</S> it; which<S>3739</S> also<S>1211</S> beareth fruit<S>2592</S>, and<S>2532</S> bringeth forth<S>4160</S>, some<S>3739</S> <S>3303</S> an hundredfold<S>1540</S>,<S>1161</S> some<S>3739</S> sixty<S>1835</S>,<S>1161</S> some<S>3739</S> thirty<S>5144</S>.
Another<S>243</S> parable<S>3850</S> put he forth<S>3908</S> unto them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, The kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is likened<S>3666</S> unto a man<S>444</S> which sowed<S>4687</S> <S>4687</S> good<S>2570</S> seed<S>4690</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> field<S>68</S>:
But<S>1161</S> while<S>1722</S> men<S>444</S> slept<S>2518</S>, his<S>846</S> enemy<S>2190</S> came<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> sowed<S>4687</S> tares<S>2215</S> among<S>303</S> <S>3319</S> the wheat<S>4621</S>, and<S>2532</S> went his way<S>565</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>3753</S> the blade<S>5528</S> was sprung up<S>985</S>, and<S>2532</S> brought forth<S>4160</S> fruit<S>2590</S>, then<S>5119</S> appeared<S>5316</S> the tares<S>2215</S> also<S>2532</S>.
So<S>1161</S> the servants<S>1401</S> of the householder<S>3617</S> came<S>4334</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, didst<S>4687</S> not<S>3780</S> thou sow<S>4687</S> good<S>2570</S> seed<S>4690</S> in<S>1722</S> thy<S>4674</S> field<S>68</S>? from whence<S>4159</S> then<S>3767</S> hath it<S>2192</S> tares<S>2215</S>?
<S>1161</S> He said<S>5346</S> unto them<S>846</S>, An enemy<S>2190</S> <S>444</S> hath done<S>4160</S> this<S>5124</S>.<S>1161</S> The servants<S>1401</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Wilt thou<S>2309</S> then<S>3767</S> that we go<S>565</S> and gather<S>4816</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>4816</S>?
But<S>1161</S> he said<S>5346</S>, Nay<S>3756</S>; lest<S>3379</S> while ye gather up<S>4816</S> the tares<S>2215</S>, ye root up<S>1610</S> also the wheat<S>4621</S> with<S>260</S> them<S>846</S>.
Let<S>863</S> both<S>297</S> grow together<S>4885</S> until<S>3360</S> the harvest<S>2326</S>: and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the time<S>2540</S> of harvest<S>2326</S> I will say<S>2046</S> to the reapers<S>2327</S>, Gather ye together<S>4816</S> first<S>4412</S> the tares<S>2215</S>, and<S>2532</S> bind<S>1210</S> them<S>846</S> in<S>1519</S> bundles<S>1197</S> to<S>4314</S> burn<S>2618</S> them<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> gather<S>4863</S> the wheat<S>4621</S> into<S>1519</S> my<S>3450</S> barn<S>596</S>.
Another<S>243</S> parable<S>3850</S> put he forth<S>3908</S> unto them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, The kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> to a grain<S>2848</S> of mustard seed<S>4615</S>, which<S>3739</S> a man<S>444</S> took<S>2983</S>, and sowed<S>4687</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> field<S>68</S>:
Which<S>3739</S> indeed<S>3303</S> is<S>2076</S> the least<S>3398</S> of all<S>3956</S> seeds<S>4690</S>: but<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> it is grown<S>837</S>, it is<S>2076</S> the greatest<S>3187</S> among herbs<S>3001</S>, and<S>2532</S> becometh<S>1096</S> a tree<S>1186</S>, so that<S>5620</S> the birds<S>4071</S> of the air<S>3772</S> come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> lodge<S>2681</S> in<S>1722</S> the branches<S>2798</S> thereof<S>846</S>.
Another<S>243</S> parable<S>3850</S> spake he<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S>; The kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> unto leaven<S>2219</S>, which<S>3739</S> a woman<S>1135</S> took<S>2983</S>, and hid<S>1470</S> in<S>1519</S> three<S>5140</S> measures<S>4568</S> of meal<S>224</S>, till<S>2193</S> the whole<S>3650</S> was<S>3739</S> leavened<S>2220</S>. <sup>measures: the word in the Greek is a measure containing about a peck and a half, wanting a little more than a pint</sup>
All<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> spake<S>2980</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto the multitude<S>3793</S> in<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>; and<S>2532</S> without<S>5565</S> a parable<S>3850</S> spake he<S>2980</S> not<S>3756</S> unto them<S>846</S>:
That<S>3704</S> it might be fulfilled<S>4137</S> which<S>3588</S> was spoken<S>4483</S> by<S>1223</S> the prophet<S>4396</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, I will open<S>455</S> my<S>3450</S> mouth<S>4750</S> in<S>1722</S> parables<S>3850</S>; I will utter<S>2044</S> things which have been kept secret<S>2928</S> from<S>575</S> the foundation<S>2602</S> of the world<S>2889</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> sent<S>863</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> away<S>863</S>, and went<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3614</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S> unto him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Declare<S>5419</S> unto us<S>2254</S> the parable<S>3850</S> of the tares<S>2215</S> of the field<S>68</S>.
He answered<S>611</S> and<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, He that soweth<S>4687</S> the good<S>2570</S> seed<S>4690</S> is<S>2076</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>;
<S>1161</S> The field<S>68</S> is<S>2076</S> the world<S>2889</S>;<S>1161</S> the good<S>2570</S> seed<S>4690</S> are<S>3778</S> <S>1526</S> the children<S>5207</S> of the kingdom<S>932</S>; but<S>1161</S> the tares<S>2215</S> are<S>1526</S> the children<S>5207</S> of the wicked<S>4190</S> one;
<S>1161</S> The enemy<S>2190</S> that sowed<S>4687</S> them<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> the devil<S>1228</S>;<S>1161</S> the harvest<S>2326</S> is<S>2076</S> the end<S>4930</S> of the world<S>165</S>; and<S>1161</S> the reapers<S>2327</S> are<S>1526</S> the angels<S>32</S>.
As<S>5618</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the tares<S>2215</S> are gathered<S>4816</S> and<S>2532</S> burned<S>2618</S> in the fire<S>4442</S>; so<S>3779</S> shall it be<S>2071</S> in<S>1722</S> the end<S>4930</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>165</S>.
The Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> shall send forth<S>649</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall gather<S>4816</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> kingdom<S>932</S> all things<S>3956</S> that offend<S>4625</S>, and<S>2532</S> them which do<S>4160</S> iniquity<S>458</S>; <sup>things: or, scandals</sup>
And<S>2532</S> shall cast<S>906</S> them<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> a furnace<S>2575</S> of fire<S>4442</S>: there<S>1563</S> shall be<S>2071</S> wailing<S>2805</S> and<S>2532</S> gnashing<S>1030</S> of teeth<S>3599</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> shall the righteous<S>1342</S> shine forth<S>1584</S> as<S>5613</S> the sun<S>2246</S> in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of their<S>846</S> Father<S>3962</S>. Who<S>3588</S> hath<S>2192</S> ears<S>3775</S> to hear<S>191</S>, let him hear<S>191</S>.
Again<S>3825</S>, the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> unto treasure<S>2344</S> hid<S>2928</S> in<S>1722</S> a field<S>68</S>; the which<S>3739</S> when a man<S>444</S> hath found<S>2147</S>, he hideth<S>2928</S>, and<S>2532</S> for<S>575</S> joy<S>5479</S> thereof<S>846</S> goeth<S>5217</S> and<S>2532</S> selleth<S>4453</S> all<S>3956</S> that<S>3745</S> he hath<S>2192</S>, and<S>2532</S> buyeth<S>59</S> that<S>1565</S> field<S>68</S>.
Again<S>3825</S>, the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> unto a merchant<S>1713</S> man<S>444</S>, seeking<S>2212</S> goodly<S>2570</S> pearls<S>3135</S>:
Who<S>3739</S>, when he had found<S>2147</S> one<S>1520</S> pearl<S>3135</S> of great price<S>4186</S>, went<S>565</S> and sold<S>4097</S> all<S>3956</S> that<S>3745</S> he had<S>2192</S>, and<S>2532</S> bought<S>59</S> it<S>846</S>.
Again<S>3825</S>, the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> unto a net<S>4522</S>, that was cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, and<S>2532</S> gathered<S>4863</S> of<S>1537</S> every<S>3956</S> kind<S>1085</S>:
Which<S>3739</S>, when<S>3753</S> it was full<S>4137</S>, they drew<S>307</S> to<S>1909</S> shore<S>123</S>, and<S>2532</S> sat down<S>2523</S>, and gathered<S>4816</S> the good<S>2570</S> into<S>1519</S> vessels<S>30</S>, but<S>1161</S> cast<S>906</S> the bad<S>4550</S> away<S>1854</S>.
So<S>3779</S> shall it be<S>2071</S> at<S>1722</S> the end<S>4930</S> of the world<S>165</S>: the angels<S>32</S> shall come forth<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> sever<S>873</S> the wicked<S>4190</S> from<S>1537</S> among<S>3319</S> the just<S>1342</S>,
And<S>2532</S> shall cast<S>906</S> them<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> the furnace<S>2575</S> of fire<S>4442</S>: there<S>1563</S> shall be<S>2071</S> wailing<S>2805</S> and<S>2532</S> gnashing<S>1030</S> of teeth<S>3599</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Have ye understood<S>4920</S> all<S>3956</S> these<S>5023</S> things<S>3956</S>? They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Yea<S>3483</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> he unto them<S>846</S>, Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> every<S>3956</S> scribe<S>1122</S> which is instructed<S>3100</S> unto<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> like<S>3664</S> unto a man<S>444</S> that is an householder<S>3617</S>, which<S>3748</S> bringeth forth<S>1544</S> out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> treasure<S>2344</S> things new<S>2537</S> and<S>2532</S> old<S>3820</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that when<S>3753</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had finished<S>5055</S> these<S>5025</S> parables<S>3850</S>, he departed<S>3332</S> thence<S>1564</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he was come<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> his own<S>846</S> country<S>3968</S>, he taught<S>1321</S> them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> synagogue<S>4864</S>, insomuch that<S>5620</S> they<S>846</S> were astonished<S>1605</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S>, Whence<S>4159</S> hath this man <S>5129</S> this<S>3778</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>, and<S>2532</S> these mighty works<S>1411</S>?
Is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> this<S>3778</S> the carpenter's<S>5045</S> son<S>5207</S>? is<S>3004</S> not<S>3780</S> his<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S> called<S>3004</S> Mary<S>3137</S>? and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>, James<S>2385</S>, and<S>2532</S> Joses<S>2500</S>, and<S>2532</S> Simon<S>4613</S>, and<S>2532</S> Judas<S>2455</S>?
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> sisters<S>79</S>, are they<S>1526</S> not<S>3780</S> all<S>3956</S> with<S>4314</S> us<S>2248</S>? Whence<S>4159</S> then<S>3767</S> hath this man <S>5129</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S>?
And<S>2532</S> they were offended<S>4624</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>. But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, A prophet<S>4396</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> without honour<S>820</S>, save<S>1508</S> in<S>1722</S> his own<S>846</S> country<S>3968</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> his own<S>846</S> house<S>3614</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he did<S>4160</S> not<S>3756</S> many<S>4183</S> mighty works<S>1411</S> there<S>1563</S> because<S>1223</S> of their<S>846</S> unbelief<S>570</S>.
